description: Displays detailed information about a job run.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The ID of the application on which the job run is submitted.

parameters.name: jobRunId
parameters.description: The ID of the job run.

nested_items.name: applicationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the application the job is running on.

nested_items.name: jobRunId
nested_items.description: The ID of the job run.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The optional job run name. This doesn't have to be unique.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The execution role ARN of the job run.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user who created the job run.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the job run was created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the job run was updated.

nested_items.name: executionRole
nested_items.description: The execution role ARN of the job run.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The state of the job run.

nested_items.name: stateDetails
nested_items.description: The state details of the job run.

nested_items.name: releaseLabel
nested_items.description: The Amazon EMR release associated with the application your job is running on.

nested_items.name: configurationOverrides
nested_items.description: The configuration settings that are used to override default configuration.

nested_items.name: applicationConfiguration
nested_items.description: The override configurations for the application.

nested_items.name: classification
nested_items.description: The classification within a configuration.

nested_items.name: properties
nested_items.description: A set of properties specified within a configuration classification.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: configurations
nested_items.description: A list of additional configurations to apply within a configuration object.

nested_items.name: monitoringConfiguration
nested_items.description: The override configurations for monitoring.

nested_items.name: s3MonitoringConfiguration
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 configuration for monitoring log publishing.

nested_items.name: logUri
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 destination URI for log publishing.

nested_items.name: encryptionKeyArn
nested_items.description: The KMS key ARN to encrypt the logs published to the given Amazon S3 destination.

nested_items.name: managedPersistenceMonitoringConfiguration
nested_items.description: The managed log persistence configuration for a job run.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Enables managed logging and defaults to true. If set to false, managed logging will be turned off.

nested_items.name: encryptionKeyArn
nested_items.description: The KMS key ARN to encrypt the logs stored in managed log persistence.

nested_items.name: cloudWatchLoggingConfiguration
nested_items.description: The Amazon CloudWatch configuration for monitoring logs. You can configure your jobs to send log information to CloudWatch.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Enables CloudWatch logging.

nested_items.name: logGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the log group in Amazon CloudWatch Logs where you want to publish your logs.

nested_items.name: logStreamNamePrefix
nested_items.description: Prefix for the CloudWatch log stream name.

nested_items.name: encryptionKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Key Management Service (KMS) key ARN to encrypt the logs that you store in CloudWatch Logs.

nested_items.name: prometheusMonitoringConfiguration
nested_items.description: The monitoring configuration object you can configure to send metrics to Amazon Managed Service for Prometheus for a job run.

nested_items.name: remoteWriteUrl
nested_items.description: The remote write URL in the Amazon Managed Service for Prometheus workspace to send metrics to.

nested_items.name: jobDriver
nested_items.description: The job driver for the job run.

nested_items.name: sparkSubmit
nested_items.description: The job driver parameters specified for Spark.

nested_items.name: entryPoint
nested_items.description: The entry point for the Spark submit job run.

nested_items.name: entryPointArguments
nested_items.description: The arguments for the Spark submit job run.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: sparkSubmitParameters
nested_items.description: The parameters for the Spark submit job run.

nested_items.name: query
nested_items.description: The query for the Hive job run.

nested_items.name: initQueryFile
nested_items.description: The query file for the Hive job run.

nested_items.name: parameters
nested_items.description: The parameters for the Hive job run.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: totalResourceUtilization
nested_items.description: The aggregate vCPU, memory, and storage resources used from the time the job starts to execute, until the time the job terminates, rounded up to the nearest second.

nested_items.name: vCPUHour
nested_items.description: The aggregated vCPU used per hour from the time job start executing till the time job is terminated.

nested_items.name: memoryGBHour
nested_items.description: The aggregated memory used per hour from the time job start executing till the time job is terminated.

nested_items.name: storageGBHour
nested_items.description: The aggregated storage used per hour from the time job start executing till the time job is terminated.

nested_items.name: networkConfiguration
nested_items.description: The network configuration for customer VPC connectivity.

nested_items.name: subnetIds
nested_items.description: The array of subnet Ids for customer VPC connectivity.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: securityGroupIds
nested_items.description: The array of security group Ids for customer VPC connectivity.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: totalExecutionDurationSeconds
nested_items.description: The job run total execution duration in seconds. This field is only available for job runs in a COMPLETED, FAILED, or CANCELLED state.

nested_items.name: executionTimeoutMinutes
nested_items.description: Returns the job run timeout value from the StartJobRun call. If no timeout was specified, then it returns the default timeout of 720 minutes.

nested_items.name: billedResourceUtilization
nested_items.description: The aggregate vCPU, memory, and storage that Amazon Web Services has billed for the job run. The billed resources include a 1-minute minimum usage for workers, plus additional storage over 20 GB per worker. Note that billed resources do not include usage for idle pre-initialized workers.

nested_items.name: vCPUHour
nested_items.description: The aggregated vCPU used per hour from the time the job starts executing until the job is terminated.

nested_items.name: memoryGBHour
nested_items.description: The aggregated memory used per hour from the time the job starts executing until the job is terminated.

nested_items.name: storageGBHour
nested_items.description: The aggregated storage used per hour from the time the job starts executing until the job is terminated.

nested_items.name: mode
nested_items.description: The mode of the job run.

nested_items.name: retryPolicy
nested_items.description: The retry policy of the job run.

nested_items.name: maxAttempts
nested_items.description: Maximum number of attempts for the job run. This parameter is only applicable for BATCH mode.

nested_items.name: maxFailedAttemptsPerHour
nested_items.description: Maximum number of failed attempts per hour. This [arameter is only applicable for STREAMING mode.

nested_items.name: attempt
nested_items.description: The attempt of the job run.

nested_items.name: attemptCreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time of when the job run attempt was created.

nested_items.name: attemptUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time of when the job run attempt was last updated.

nested_items.name: startedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the job moved to the RUNNING state.

nested_items.name: endedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the job was terminated.

nested_items.name: queuedDurationMilliseconds
nested_items.description: The total time for a job in the QUEUED state in milliseconds.
